markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Duneshaker Solifugid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=810)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The largest solifugids, duneshakers, are so immense that their movements make the terrain around them tremble. They can prey on creatures the size of mammoths or even larger.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Duneshaker Solifugid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=810)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 89</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +33, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +33

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +7

**Con** +7

**Int** -5

**Wis** +4

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +31 

**Ref** +33 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 340

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet, burrow 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +35 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d10+17 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+17 slashing

**Earth Shaker**   Each turn, the first time the duneshaker solifugid is adjacent to a Large or smaller creature during a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action it's using, that creature must succeed at a DC 39 Reflex save or fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

**[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** <actions string="Single Action" />  claw

**Venom Spray** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) The duneshaker solifugid spews toxic barbs at all creatures in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within the area takes 10d6 poison damage (DC 39 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails its saving throw is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1d6 rounds (or permanently on a critical failure). The duneshaker solifugid can't use Venom Spray again for 1d4 rounds.

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The duneshaker solifugid Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the duneshaker solifugid began this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-114" />
name: Duneshaker Solifugid
